subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: At the plate, Lucas Duda failed three times against the Diamondbacks to cash in with runners on base; on the mound, Zack Wheeler shook off early trouble to pitch ‘a heck of a game.’
snippet: At the plate, Lucas Duda failed three times against the Diamondbacks to cash in with runners on base; on the mound, Zack Wheeler shook off early trouble to pitch ‘a heck of a game.’
